nodes.text: Finished by Keshiri sculptors in 4985 BBY, this four-meter-tall glass statue of Lost Tribe of Sith leader Yaru Korsin was presented to him in the Kesh Sith Temple. Although it drew a rave review from Korsin's wife Seelah's Keshiri aide Tilden Kaah, neither Korsin thought it looked much like him.
